Content.Text:
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
How many times do I have to tell you?
You need to learn to take care of
yourself!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, Dr. Klaus. I don't really
have anything else I can say...

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
How many times has this happened, now?
I'll not allow it to happen again!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? Are you hurt?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
If not, please leave. I'm busy right
now.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
With what, you ask? Iroha here has hurt
herself, so I'm just chiding her for it!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not hurt badly. Dr. Klaus has
already treated my injuries.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
That's how I reacted as well in the
beginning!
<PAGE>
But now, every single day she trains,
she also ends up in here being treated
for something! Of course I'm angry!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
She always apologizes so meekly when
confronted about it, but the next day
she's out getting hurt again!
<PAGE>
You need to work on your focus, girl!
Either that, or you've just got a screw
loose!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I really am very sorry. Once I get into
my training all other concerns just fade
from my thoughts...
<PAGE>
I've tried all sorts of things to remedy
the issue, I assure you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Your lack of concentration amazes me,
but I'm likely to end up a neurotic if
this carries on any longer!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Today I've finally reached the limit of
my patience.
<PAGE>
If you aren't going to be able to
change, Iroha, I have an idea. <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
The next time Iroha hurts herself, I
want you to tear down her forge!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No! That's too cruel!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blacksmith has to handle many
dangerous tasks. At this rate you'll 
really hurt yourself one day!
<PAGE>
You'd never accept it if I told you to
stop training altogether, now would you?
<PAGE>
So the only way to do stop you is to
take the forge itself away! If you can't
train then you can't get hurt!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Being unable to train... No! I could
never accept that!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You say that's going too far? You would
protect her, would you?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You think your opinions mean anything to
me? You've been in here with a string of
injuries yourself!
<PAGE>
I think you'll find her situation is
very much like your own!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Sit down, both of you! I'm going to
lecture you both, right now!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh no!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
No backtalk! Sit down and be quiet!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. I'm sorry for getting you all
caught up in this.
<PAGE>
Now you have to suffer through this as
well.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I never thought a lecture could be so
mentally draining.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I think this one has really made a big
difference to me. I need to stay away
from the hospital for a while!
<PAGE>
I'm going to do everything I can to
prevent getting hurt ever again!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to do everything I can to
prevent getting hurt ever again!
